sentence.Network_en: Ellen DeGeneres shared one more great picture from her wedding photo album.
sentence.Network_cn: 名嘴艾伦·蒂珍妮丝又与大家分享了她婚礼照相簿中出彩的一张照片.

sentence.Network_en: The moment he met DeGeneres, he gave her a big hug and a lollipop.
sentence.Network_cn: 一见到主持人Ellen, 小宝就送上了大大的拥抱和一个棒棒糖.

list.abs: 3.肝豆状核变性（hepatolenticular degeneration）:又称Wilson病。本病的震颤大致与parkinson综合征相类似，主动肌与交互性节律收缩，当随意.
临床医学英语词汇总表_百度文库 ... amrinone 胺吡酮 amyloid degeneration 淀粉样变性 anabolism 同化作用，合成代谢.
2、脂肪变性（fatty degeneration）：细胞内甘油三脂的蓄积。（1）好发部位：肝细胞、心肌纤维、肾小管上皮。
黄斑变性 (Macular degeneration) 是指黄斑功能逐步下降。它是引起65岁以上人群视力下降的第二大常见原因，仅次于白内障。

auth_sentence.content: Other famous attendees included Maria Bello, Ashton Kutcher, Jason Segel, Ellen DeGeneres, Colin Farrell and Chevy Chase.
auth_sentence.res_content: Other famous attendees included Maria Bello, Ashton Kutcher, Jason Segel, Ellen DeGeneres, Colin Farrell and Chevy Chase.

auth_sentence.content: With the voices of Geoffrey Rush, Barry Humphries, Willem Dafoe, Allison Janney, and—the funniest of the shoal—Ellen DeGeneres.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: With the voices of Geoffrey Rush, Barry Humphries, Willem Dafoe, Allison Janney, and—the funniest of the shoal—Ellen DeGeneres.

auth_sentence.content: DeGeneres found the little dog a home with her hairstylist , who had two daughters, ages 11 and 12.
